item.sword_soaring.vatansever.descriptio: —— §b§lIts frost's chill guards realms serene;§r§c§lThrough slaughter's maze, purges taint unclean§r

Forged post-Celestial War by Kunwu's master smith, this blade consumed century-cured Netheriron and divine bones within Guixu's crucible. At its birth, heaven wept stardust tears. Its edge bears Celestial Array sigils, while draconic essence coils along its spine - not mere steel, but destiny's answer when cataclysm demands blood to preserve mortal hearths. Now awakened, its glacial arrays shatter mountains yet shelter cooking-smoke villages.
skill.sword_soaring.babylon.tooltip:
Unleash treasury of blades raining from skies

§e§l"Hmph. Noble armaments deserve proper use"§r

Cooldown: %.1fs
skill.sword_soaring.kill_aura_1.tooltip:
§b§lCelestial stars descend to mortal plane,/Ring's radiance brings purging flame§r

Summons meteor array damaging nearby foes (scales with weapon)

Duration: %.1fs
Cooldown: %.1fs
skill.sword_soaring.kill_aura_2.tooltip:
§c§lCrimson rings bloom as lotus fire,/Scorching all life, leaving none entire§r

Ignites blazing array (scales with weapon), sets foes aflame

Duration: %.1fs
Cooldown: %.1fs
skill.sword_soaring.rain_sword.tooltip:
§f§lBig Dipper's might forms sword domain,/Where array reaches - evil's bane§r

Each strike summons %d-%d phantom blades

Duration: %.1fs
Cooldown: %.1fs
skill.sword_soaring.screen_sword.tooltip:
§f§lSword-qi weaves net sealing realms eight,/Array complete - heaven-earth resonate§r

Summon Voidblade Domain to deflect harm. Nullifies projectiles, counters melee strikes with blade's maximum might

Loses 1 sword per %d/6 hits, healing %.1f HP

Duration: %.1fs
Cooldown: %.1fs
skill.sword_soaring.sword_soaring_elytra: If you have learnt this skill, when flying in lv1 and lv2 style, flying will not consume stamina and enter cooldown.
skill.sword_soaring.sword_soaring_master: If you have learnt this skill, when flying in lv1 and lv2 style, flying will not consume stamina and enter cooldown.
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever.tooltip10: §7Coiled dragon's breath becomes edged storm,/Array awakens - sun and moon reform§r
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever.tooltip2: §7With glacial sigils, frostblades form,/Inscribed with runes that rend the soul's core§r
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever.tooltip4: §7Three suns merge through draconic might,/One thrust parts clouds to pierce heaven's height§r
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever.tooltip6: §7Six peaks condense in crushing arc,/One slash cleanses hell's eternal dark§r
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever.tooltip8: §7Blade-wrought walls seal life's last breath,/Guixu's silence sings requiem of death§r
skill.sword_soaring.vatansever_dodge.too: Dodge Skill for Vatansever. This skill will be learned automatically when you equip Vatansever. And the skill is invalid when holding other weapon.
skill.sword_soaring.wan_jian_gui_zong.to:
Qi commands the Eight Directions,
Blades dominate Six Realms' foundations.

Soaring qi summons thousand-edge storm,
Focused will merges myriad blades' form.

Peak sword dao - mysteries unfold,
Only enlightened may this art behold.

Cooldown: %.1fs
